front.title: Additional Algorithms and Identifiers for use of Elliptic Curve Cryptography with PKIX (Explicit Identification of One-Way Hash Functions)

abstract.t: Dan Brown from Certicom has submitted a specification for Additional Algorithms and Identifiers for use of Elliptic Curve Cryptography with PKIX. This document proposes a different approach for identifying the one-way hash function used with the ECDSA signature algorithm.
